Plugin Documentation

Goals available for this plugin:

GoalDescription
GMavenPlus-Plugin:compileCompiles the main sources
GMavenPlus-Plugin:executeExecutes Groovy scripts (in the pom or external)
GMavenPlus-Plugin:generateStubsGenerates stubs for the main sources
GMavenPlus-Plugin:groovydocGenerates Groovydoc for the main sources (note that this mojo cannot be run on versions of Groovy before 1.5.0)
GMavenPlus-Plugin:helpDisplay help information on GMavenPlus-Plugin.
Call 
  mvn gmavenplus:help -Ddetail=true -Dgoal=<goal-name>
to display parameter details.
GMavenPlus-Plugin:testCompileCompiles the test sources
GMavenPlus-Plugin:testGenerateStubsGenerates stubs for the test sources
GMavenPlus-Plugin:testGroovydocGenerates Groovydoc for the test sources (note that this mojo cannot be run on versions of Groovy before 1.5.0)

System Requirements

The following specifies the minimum requirements to run this Maven plugin:

Maven2.0
JDK1.4
MemoryNo minimum requirement.
Disk SpaceNo minimum requirement.

Usage

You should specify the version in your project's plugin configuration:

<project>
  ...
  <build>
    <!-- To define the plugin version in your parent POM -->
    <pluginManagement>
      <plugins>
        <plugin>
          <groupId>GMavenPlus</groupId>
          <artifactId>GMavenPlus-Plugin</artifactId>
          <version>1.0-alpha1-SNAPSHOT</version>
        </plugin>
        ...
      </plugins>
    </pluginManagement>
    <!-- To use the plugin goals in your POM or parent POM -->
    <plugins>
      <plugin>
        <groupId>GMavenPlus</groupId>
        <artifactId>GMavenPlus-Plugin</artifactId>
        <version>1.0-alpha1-SNAPSHOT</version>
      </plugin>
      ...
    </plugins>
  </build>
  ...
</project>

For more information, see "Guide to Configuring Plug-ins"
